aboutContent:
Howdy, most folks call me Jon-Jon. I work primarily with men who feel worn 
down, disconnected, or stuck, often after years of carrying 
responsibility, stress, or trauma alone. Many of the men I work with are
 veterans, first responders, or everyday guys who learned to push 
through rather than look inward. As a U.S. Army veteran, I understand 
that culture firsthand. Over time, this can lead to numbness, anger, or a
 quiet loss of self. Therapy here is practical, honest, and reflective. 
Personal freedom requires taking a position in your own life. I help men
 do that with clarity, grit, and compassion.   

I offer constructive, thoughtful therapy for men seeking real change. Our
 work focuses on clarity, self-responsibility, and understanding how 
past experiences shape present struggles. I help men face what they’ve 
been avoiding, reconnect with their values, and respond to life with 
intention. My approach is grounded and non-pathologizing.   

If you’re ready to stop reacting to life, understand yourself more deeply,
 and take intentional steps toward a steadier sense of self, I invite 
you to reach out. Therapy here is down-to-earth, principled, and focused
 on your growth, clarity, and resilience.
heroSubtitle:
Anticipated Start Date: March 1, 2026
Services will begin upon completion of Texas LCSW licensure.
